content.title: UDF manifesto promises to make Kochi first total smart city in south India
content.body: Breaking update: The manifesto promises projects to ensure comprehensive development of the city and create an environment for safe living. The commitments include a garbage-free city, an end to the mosquito menace, relief from traffic snarls, and elimination of problems caused by stray dogs
